summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Hair Salon Booking App (Parrucco). All 22 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI testing verified landing page, auth flow, booking flow, and admin dashboard functionality.

issues: 'Today's Summary' section only shows when there are appointments for today - currently no appointments for Jan 30, 2026

critical_code_review_comments: WhatsApp notifications via Twilio are MOCKED - requires real TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID, TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN, TWILIO_WHATSAPP_NUMBER in backend/.env to function
TEST_Service and TEST_Hairdresser created during testing should be cleaned up in production
seed_data_creation: Database seeded via /api/seed endpoint - created admin user, 5 services, 3 hairdressers
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features tested and working: Auth (login/register), Booking flow (service->hairdresser->date/time selection), Admin dashboard (appointments, services, hairdressers, settings management), Availability API correctly returns available slots excluding booked times. Calendar correctly disables Sundays and past dates.

availability_system.details: /api/availability endpoint returns correct available slots, excludes booked times, respects service duration

booking_page.details: 3-step booking flow works: service selection, hairdresser selection, date/time selection. Calendar disables non-working days (Sundays) and past dates. Time slots load dynamically from /api/availability

admin_appointments.details: Shows stats (total, pending, confirmed, cancelled), filters by date and status work, Today's Summary section shows when appointments exist for today

admin_confirm_cancel.details: Backend APIs for confirm/cancel tested and working. UI buttons present when pending appointments exist

admin_services_management.details: CRUD operations for services working via API and UI

admin_hairdressers_management.details: CRUD operations for hairdressers working via API and UI

admin_settings.details: Settings page shows hero configuration, image suggestions, working days, time slots

whatsapp_twilio.reason: TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID, TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN, TWILIO_WHATSAPP_NUMBER not configured in backend/.env
whatsapp_twilio.impact: WhatsApp notifications (booking confirmation, reminders, admin alerts) will not be sent
